com.amazon.clouddrive.configuration

Class AccountConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.clouddrive.configuration.AccountConfiguration

  • public class AccountConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration that is specific to the customer's account. The instance should be abandoned when the customer logs out. AccountConfiguration requires an AuthenticatedURLConnectionFactory instance for generating HttpURLConnections. The provided AmazonAuthorizationConnectionFactory is recommended when using Login with Amazon. See https://developer.amazon.com/public/apis/engage/login-with-amazon/docs/use_sdk_android.html for how to create an AmazonAuthorizationManager instance. The AccountConfiguration optionally takes an EndpointsCache. The EndpointsCache holds Amazon Cloud Drive endpoints so they do not need to be resolved for every call. If EndpointsCache is not provided, the SimpleEndpointsCache instance is used which caches the endpoints for the duration of the client instance.
